Centre-Ville, MontrÃ©al QuÃ©bec, Canada, H3C 3A7 Phone: 514-340-4711 x3914 Fax: 514-340-3240 E-mail: michel.desmarais @ polymtl. ca Web site: www.professeurs.polymtl.ca/michel.desmarais/desmarais_michel_c.html (this page) Short Bio Michel Desmarais is professor at the Computer and Software Engineering Department of Polytechnique Montreal since 2002. His fields of expertise are Artificial Intelligence, Human Computer Interfaces, and Cognitive modeling. After his Ph.D. in Psychology at the University of Montreal, he spent ten years at the Montreal Computer Research Institute (CRIM) as scientific lead of a research team. He later held management and R&D positions in a private firm specialized in the development of Web applications. He was editor of the Journal of Educational Data Mining from 2013 to 2017 and is highly involved in the Educational Data Mining and User Modeling communities.
